summary: A group of athletes helping a poor village must stop an evil tyrant and his men from terrorizing the village.
cast: Nappon Gomarachun|Santisuk Promsiri|Dan Chupong|Piyapong Piew-on|Somrak Khamsing|Amornthep Waewsang|Suebsak Pansueb|Nantaway Wongwanichislip|Kessarin Ektawatkul|Rattaporn Khemtong|Chatthapong Phantana-Angkul|Sasisa Jindamanee|Payong Mounda|Swat Hoopsom|June Angela|Vanna Bonta|Sahatchai 'Stop' Chumrum|Elyse Dinh|Alex Haney|Josiah D. Lee|Marlene Sharp|Wannakit Sirioput|Don Thai Theerathada|Eddie Vee
title: Born to Fight (Nacido para luchar)
